Package ohos.global.resource

Class ResourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.global.resource.ResourceManager

  • public abstract class ResourceManager
extends Object

    Manages all resources in the resources directory of the application package.

    ResourceManager instances are obtained only from the context.

    Since:
    1
    See Also:
    Resource, ResourceType

    • Method Detail

      • getResource

        public abstract Resource getResource​(int resId)
                              throws IOException,
                                     NotExistException
        Obtains the resource based on the resource ID.
        Parameters:
        resId - Indicates the resource ID.
        Returns:
        Returns the resource object; returns null if the resource ID does not match any resources.
        Throws:
        NotExistException - Throws this exception if the resource ID does not match any resources. The resource ID must be automatically generated by the IDE or resource tool, or provided by the system.
        IOException - Throws this exception if an I/O error occurs during resource read.

      • getIdentifier

        public abstract String getIdentifier​(int resId)
                              throws IOException,
                                     NotExistException
        Obtains the resource name based on the resource ID.
        Parameters:
        resId - Indicates the resource ID.
        Returns:
        Returns the resource name with type as type_name; returns null if the resource ID does not match any resources.
        Throws:
        NotExistException - Throws this exception if the resource ID does not match any resources. The resource ID must be automatically generated by the IDE or resource tool, or provided by the system.
        IOException - Throws this exception if an I/O error occurs during resource read.

      • getElement

        public abstract Element getElement​(int resId)
                            throws IOException,
                                   NotExistException,
                                   WrongTypeException
        Obtains an Element object based on its resource ID.
        Parameters:
        resId - Indicates the resource ID.
        Returns:
        Returns the Element object associated with the resource ID.
        Throws:
        NotExistException - Throws this exception if the resource ID does not match any resources. The resource ID must be automatically generated by the IDE or resource tool, or provided by the system.
        IOException - Throws this exception if an I/O error occurs during resource read.
        WrongTypeException - Throws this exception if the resource is not of the Element type.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Element

      • getTheme

        @Deprecated
public abstract Theme getTheme​(int resId)
                        throws IOException,
                               NotExistException,
                               WrongTypeException
        Deprecated. See Element#getTheme().
        Obtains a Theme instance based on the resource ID.
        Parameters:
        resId - Indicates the resource ID.
        Returns:
        Returns a Theme instance.
        Throws:
        NotExistException - Throws this exception if the resource ID does not match any resources. The resource ID must be automatically generated by the IDE or resource tool, or provided by the system.
        IOException - Throws this exception if an I/O error occurs during resource read.
        WrongTypeException - Throws this exception if the resource is not of the Theme type.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Theme

      • getSolidXml

        public abstract SolidXml getSolidXml​(int resId)
                              throws IOException,
                                     NotExistException,
                                     WrongTypeException
        Obtains a solid XML document based on the resource ID.
        Parameters:
        resId - Indicates the resource ID.
        Returns:
        Returns the solid XML document of the resource; returns null if an error occurs during conversion to a solid XML document.
        Throws:
        NotExistException - Throws this exception if the resource ID does not match any resources. The resource ID must be automatically generated by the IDE or resource tool, or provided by the system.
        IOException - Throws this exception if an I/O error occurs during resource read.
        WrongTypeException - Throws this exception if the resource is not of the Solid XML type.

        Returns:
        Returns the RawFileEntry object.

        Returns:

      • getMediaPath

        public abstract String getMediaPath​(int resId)
                             throws IOException,
                                    NotExistException,
                                    WrongTypeException
        Obtains the media file path based on the resource ID.
        Parameters:
        resId - Indicates the resource ID.
        Returns:
        Returns the media file path.
        Throws:
        NotExistException - Throws this exception if the resource ID does not match any resources. The resource ID must be automatically generated by the IDE or resource tool, or provided by the system.
        IOException - Throws this exception if an I/O error occurs during resource read.
        WrongTypeException - Throws this exception if the resource is not of the string type.

      • createPattern

        public abstract Pattern createPattern​(List<TypedAttribute.AttrData> data)
        Creates a ohos.global.resource.solidxml.TypedAttribute.Pattern instance based on the array that contains TypedAttribute.AttrData.
        Parameters:
        data - Indicates the set of attribute data. Each attribute data has its own name, value, and type.
        Returns:
        Returns the created ohos.global.resource.solidxml.TypedAttribute.Pattern instance.
        Since:
        4
